comments:
This is the simplest use case I could think of, but I started out advising calls
to println, so I know it's not the empty class and aspect that causes this.

directory structure:
bugs/
  incremental/
    BasicAspect.java
    Basic.java

BasicAspect.java:
---
package incremental;
public aspect BasicAspect{}
---

Basic.java:
---
package incremental;
public class Basic{}


Steps to reproduce:
[...]/bugs% ajc -incremental -sourceroots .
    press enter to recompile (q to quit):
[... from another shell:...]/bugs% touch incremental/BasicAspect.java
[... in first window hit enter ...]
